properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHALL C JOIN CHALL_STATUS S USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE CHALL_STATUS = 2 AND S.USER_ID = ?

SELECT RNUM , CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START FROM (SELECT RNUM , CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START FROM CLIST JOIN CHALL_STATUS USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND USER_ID = ?) JOIN CHALL_STATUS USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE CHALL_STATUS = 2
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHALL C JOIN CHALL_STATUS S USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE C_HITS = 'Y' AND S.USER_ID = ?

SELECT RNUM , CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START , CHALL_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START FROM CHALL CH JOIN CHALL_CATEGORY USING(CATE_ID) JOIN USER_INFO U ON (U.USER_ID = CH.USER_ID) JOIN CHALL_STATUS USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE U.USER_ID = ? AND C_HITS = 'Y') JOIN CHALL_STATUS USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND C_HITS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHALL C JOIN CHALL_STATUS S USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE CHALL_STATUS = 1 AND S.USER_ID = ?

SELECT RNUM , CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT , CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START , CHALL_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , CHALL_NO , CHALL_TITLE , CHALL_PEOPLE , CHALL_DATE , FILE_PATH , CHALL_CONFIRM , CHALL_FREQUENCY , CHALL_PERIOD , CHALL_PAYMENT ,CHALL_CONTENT , CHALL_COUNT , NICKNAME , CATE_NAME , CHALL_CNT , CHALL_START FROM CHALL CH JOIN CHALL_CATEGORY USING(CATE_ID) JOIN USER_INFO U ON (U.USER_ID = CH.USER_ID) JOIN CHALL_STATUS USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE U.USER_ID = ? AND CHALL_STATUS = 1) JOIN CHALL_STATUS USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND CHALL_STATUS = 1
SELECT USER_ID , CHALL_NO , CHALL_STATUS , JOIN_CALL_DATE , C_HITS FROM CHALL_STATUS WHERE CHALL_NO = ? AND USER_ID = ?
SELECT C_HITS FROM CHALL_STATUS WHERE USER_ID = ? AND CHALL_NO = ?
UPDATE CHALL_STATUS SET C_HITS = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = ? AND CHALL_NO = ? AND C_HITS = 'Y'
